contents.text: Welcome to Salesforce, the world’s number one CRM platform based in San Francisco.
For Sales inquiries and product demos, press '1'.
To speak with a sales representative, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a Salesforce sales representative. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: Schedule a quick Salesforce product demo with a sales representative
I’d like to speak with a sales rep about using Salesforce to manage client leads for my veteran-owned security firm.
Schedule a technical demo of the Sales Cloud REST API integration with a sales engineer.
I’d like a product demo and need to speak with a sales representative to understand the features.
I need to schedule a demo of Salesforce to see how it can help manage my research data workflow.

contents.text: To request pricing information and consultation, press '2'.
Thank you for your patience. We are connecting you to our pricing and consultation team.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed pricing information and a brief consultation
I need pricing details and guidance on which Salesforce subscription would suit my nonprofit veteran support organization.
Obtain a detailed quote for 500 Salesforce Enterprise Edition licenses and consult on volume discounts.
I need detailed pricing information and advice on which Salesforce plan would suit me best.
I'm looking for detailed pricing and consultation on an academic license of Salesforce for my physics projects.

contents.text: If you are an existing customer and need technical assistance, press '1'.
One moment please while we transfer you to a Salesforce support engineer. Thank you for holding.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with my existing Salesforce account
I’m an existing customer and need technical assistance migrating our veteran outreach data into Salesforce.
Get assistance troubleshooting OAuth token expiration errors in our Salesforce sandbox integration.
I’m an existing customer having trouble logging into my account and need technical support.
I'm experiencing issues importing experimental data into Salesforce and need technical support to troubleshoot the integration.

contents.text: To contact your account manager, press '2'.
Please stay on the line as we connect you to your dedicated account manager.

navigationGoals: Connect with my dedicated Salesforce account manager
I want to speak with my account manager to adjust our service level agreement for our veteran employment program.
Connect me to my dedicated account manager to discuss contract renewal timelines and usage analytics.
I want to speak with my dedicated account manager about my current subscription and get some guidance.
I'd like to speak with my Salesforce account manager about renewing and adjusting our subscription plan.
